products.title: Mood Fr Voile Cotton White Roller Blind
products.description: Their mood voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Mood fr voile cotton white is a semi-translucent stylish, light white roller and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in this modern white shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame retardant coating makes this sheer roller blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cotton - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) in cotton is a subtle shade of white that provides a clean yet discreet look to any window. The sturdy, durable fabric is also flexible and smooth, making for a high quality, easily usable blackout blind. Team the cotton with soft pastels and light woods for a light and airy kitchen, or with heavy greys and blacks for an industrial-look living room. You might even use it in the bedroom, where it would sit pretty amongst florals and checks.

products.title: Kerry Cotton Roller Blind
products.description: We love their neutral tones here, and there is no blind more neutral than the kerry cotton. The gorgeous and flawless cream tones are wonderfully flexible, complementing almost any scheme, whether it is full of brash blues and reds or more earthier browns and greens. Try throwing it in a room with wood furnishings or panelling and get a charming rustic flavour, or dont, im a website not your decorator.
